meanings.definition: Satisfied to the full; satisfied to excess.
meanings.sent1: After the big meal, I felt completely satiated.
meanings.sent2: The delicious dessert left me feeling satiated and content.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked satiated after eating all the treats in one go.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity for adventure was satiated by the thrilling roller coaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The sun's warmth on my skin was a satiated feeling of comfort.

meanings.sent1: The cozy blanket made me feel satiated and warm.
meanings.sent2: The successful completion of the project left me satiated with pride.
meanings.sent3: The book lover was satiated after reading the entire series in one weekend.
meanings.sent4: The artist's creativity was satiated by the vibrant colors of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The fresh air in the forest was a satiated relief from the city pollution.
